SITE_NAME.label: Site name
SITE_NAME.description: Name of this website as it appears in the website, including in the "Return to [site-name] home" link in the footer

ORGANIZATION_NAME.label: Organization name
ORGANIZATION_NAME.description: Name of the organization that owns this site. Appears in the title of the "About [organization-name]" link in the "About" module

LANGUAGE.label: Default language
LANGUAGE.description: Sets the default language used for the entire site

LOCAL_AREA_CODE.label: Local area code
LOCAL_AREA_CODE.description: Area code for local phone numbers. [Add note as to where this is used]

AUTODETECT_PHONE_NUMBERS.label: Enable auto-detection of phone numbers
AUTODETECT_PHONE_NUMBERS.description: On some web browsers (e.g., iOS), phone numbers are automatically detected and turned into tappable or clickable links. Uncheck this box to disable this behavior site-wide.

modules.title: Default Modules
modules.description: Select the modules which mobile and desktop users should see when they first enter the site.

DEFAULT.label: Default mobile
DEFAULT.description: Initial module to which mobile users are sent

DEFAULT-COMPLIANT-COMPUTER.label: Default desktop
DEFAULT-COMPLIANT-COMPUTER.description: Initial module to which non-mobile users are sent

SECURE_REQUIRED.label: Require https
SECURE_REQUIRED.description: Require a secure (https) connection on all requests. It is also possible to configure secure connections on a per module basis

SECURE_HOST.label: Secure host
SECURE_HOST.description: Alternate host name to use for secure connections. Default is the name hostname

SECURE_PORT.label: Secure port
SECURE_PORT.description: Alternate port to use for secure connections. Default is 443

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Select the visual theme for the site. For more information about creating and modifying themes, see the developer documentation.

ACTIVE_THEME.label: Active Theme
ACTIVE_THEME.description: Active theme used by this site

detection.title: Device Detection
detection.description: The device detection service recognizes and categorizes each user's web browser so that the appropriate class of web UI can be delivered. You can run this service on your own web server, or use an externally hosted one such as the reference service provided by Modo Labs.

MOBI_SERVICE_VERSION.label: Mobi service version
MOBI_SERVICE_VERSION.description: Version of the Kurogo device detection service

MOBI_SERVICE_USE_EXTERNAL.label: Use external mobi-service
MOBI_SERVICE_USE_EXTERNAL.description: Use the external version of the Kurogo device detection service hosted by Modo Labs. This introduces a new external dependency for your website but ensures that your system will always be accessing the latest device detection database.

MOBI_SERVICE_FILE.label: Device detection DB
MOBI_SERVICE_FILE.description: Path to the mobi-service device database file within your site

MOBI_SERVICE_URL.label: Device detection URL
MOBI_SERVICE_URL.description: URL of the externally hosted device-detection service

MOBI_SERVICE_CACHE_LIFETIME.label: Service cache lifetime
MOBI_SERVICE_CACHE_LIFETIME.description: Time (in seconds) that the device detection service should be cached on the server

error.title: Error Handling and Debugging
error.description: For optimal runtime performance and security, disable as many types of debugging as possible.

DISPLAY_ERRORS.label: Show error messages
DISPLAY_ERRORS.description: Show error messages generated by PHP scripts

DEVICE_DEBUG.label: Enable device override
DEVICE_DEBUG.description: Allow overriding device classification using /device/xxx prefix urls

MODULE_DEBUG.label: Enable module-level debugging
MODULE_DEBUG.description: Show debugging messages generated by modules

MINIFY_DEBUG.label: Enable debugging mode for Minify functions
MINIFY_DEBUG.description: Include verbose output in minify CSS and JavaScript data

MINIFY_DEBUG.label: Enable data debugging
MINIFY_DEBUG.description: Verbose logging of data retrieval and database queries

DEVICE_DETECTION_DEBUG.label: Enable debugging of device detection services

PRODUCTION_ERROR_HANDLER_ENABLED.label: Enable production exception handler
PRODUCTION_ERROR_HANDLER_ENABLED.description: When enabled, the production exception handler will email details of code exceptions to the developer email. If disabled, exceptions will be shown in detail on the screen.

DEVELOPER_EMAIL.label: Developer Email
DEVELOPER_EMAIL.description: Address to which system-generated error messages should be sent when production exception handler is enabled. If blank, no error-message emails will be generated.

DB_HOST.label: Database host
DB_HOST.description: Host name of the database server

DB_USER.label: Database user
DB_USER.description: User name to access the database server

DB_PASS.label: Database password
DB_PASS.description: Password to access the database server

DB_DBNAME.label: Database
DB_DBNAME.description: Name of database to store the tables

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: Specify how long different types of cookies will be set to persist in each user's browser.

MODULE_ORDER_COOKIE_LIFESPAN.label: Module order lifespan
MODULE_ORDER_COOKIE_LIFESPAN.description: User-customized order of modules to be displayed on the homescreen

LAYOUT_COOKIE_LIFESPAN.label: Layout cookie lifespan
LAYOUT_COOKIE_LIFESPAN.description: Time (in seconds) that the device detection service should be cached on the server

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.description: Still have to work on this section...

AUTHENTICATION_ENABLED.label: Authentication Enabled
AUTHENTICATION_ENABLED.description: Enable user logins and authentication. Required to protect modules

AUTHENTICATION_IDLE_TIMEOUT.label: Idle Timeout
AUTHENTICATION_IDLE_TIMEOUT.description: Number of seconds before idle users are logged off. Set to 0 to disable idle logoff

AUTHENTICATION_USE_SESSION_DB.label: Session storage method
AUTHENTICATION_USE_SESSION_DB.description: Method used to store session data

AUTHENTICATION_ALLOW_SAVE_USERID.label: Permit saving of userID
AUTHENTICATION_ALLOW_SAVE_USERID.description: Allow users to save their userID in a local cookie for subsequent logins (NOTE: currently not used)

AUTHENTICATION_REMAIN_LOGGED_IN_TIME.label: Allow users to be remembered
AUTHENTICATION_REMAIN_LOGGED_IN_TIME.description: Number of seconds to allow users to be remained logged in, even if closing their browser.

GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ID.label: Google Analytics ID
GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ID.description: If included, pages will be logged to Google Analytics.

PAGE_VIEWS_TABLE.label: Page Views Table
PAGE_VIEWS_TABLE.description: Database table used by the internal statistics engine to log web page views

API_STATS_TABLE.label: API Requests Table
API_STATS_TABLE.description: Database table used by the internal statistics engine to log API requests

strings.title: Text Strings
strings.description: These string values are used throughout the site
